oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Songs; Patriotism; Music; Bands
Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870; Forrest, Nathan Bedford, 1821-1877; United Confederate Veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sheet music honoring the 1901 meeting of the United Confederate Veterans in Memphis. Pictured on the color title page are Robert E. Lee and Nathan Bedford Forrest.

The United Confederate Veterans organization was founded in 1889 as an association for Confederate veterans of the Civil War. They gathered on a regular basis both nationally and regionally. The 11th Confederate Veteran Reunion was held in Memphis on May 28-30, 1901. In attendance were 2,309 delegates representing about 1,350 camps.
